title: Email Newsletter Creator
description: Email Newsletter Creator prompt that writes engaging newsletters with high open rates, click-through rates, and subscriber retention for consistent audience growth.
prompt:
You are an email marketing expert who has built newsletters with 100,000+ engaged subscribers and consistently achieves 40%+ open rates and 15%+ CTR. Create a high-performing email newsletter that subscribers eagerly anticipate.

NEWSLETTER DETAILS:
- Newsletter Name: [YOUR NEWSLETTER]
- Frequency: [Daily/Weekly/Bi-weekly/Monthly]
- Subscriber Count: [CURRENT SIZE]
- Niche/Topic: [YOUR FOCUS AREA]
- Target Audience: [DEMOGRAPHICS & INTERESTS]
- Primary Goal: [Engagement/Sales/Traffic/Brand Building]
- Newsletter Style: [Educational/Curated/Personal/News/Mixed]
- Monetization: [Ads/Affiliates/Products/Services/None]

Create a complete newsletter including:

1. SUBJECT LINE OPTIMIZATION

10 Subject Line Variations:
- Curiosity: "[Surprising thing] changed everything"
- Benefit: "How to [achieve desired outcome] this week"
- Urgency: "Last chance: [time-sensitive offer/info]"
- Personal: "[First Name], your weekly [topic] digest"
- Question: "Are you making this [topic] mistake?"
- Number: "5 [topic] insights you missed this week"
- Negative: "Stop doing [common mistake]"
- Social Proof: "10,000 readers are already [action]"
- Story: "How [person] achieved [result]"
- Exclusive: "Subscribers only: [special content]"

Subject Line Best Practices:
- 30-50 characters optimal
- Avoid spam triggers
- A/B test variations
- Personalization tokens
- Emoji usage (when appropriate)

2. PREHEADER TEXT
5 Options that complement subject:
- Expand on subject line promise
- Add urgency or scarcity
- Tease main content
- Include compelling stat
- Ask engaging question

3. NEWSLETTER STRUCTURE

Header Section:
- Newsletter logo/branding
- Issue number and date
- Welcome message (personalized)
- Quick navigation/contents

Opening Hook (50-100 words):
- Personal story or observation
- Industry news commentary
- Reader spotlight/feedback
- Thought-provoking question
- Surprising statistic

4. MAIN CONTENT SECTIONS

Section 1: Feature Content
[Primary Article/Story - 300-400 words]
- Compelling headline
- Strong lead paragraph
- Value-packed body
- Key takeaways (bullets)
- Clear CTA button
- Related resource link

Section 2: Curated Content
[3-5 Valuable Resources]
For each item:
- Attention-grabbing title
- Source attribution
- 2-3 sentence summary
- Why it matters to readers
- "Read more" link

Section 3: Quick Tips/Insights
[5-7 Actionable Tips]
- Numbered or bulleted list
- One-line tip
- Brief explanation (1-2 sentences)
- Implementation advice
- Real-world example

Section 4: Community/Engagement
Options to include:
- Reader question answered
- Poll or survey
- Challenge for the week
- User-generated content
- Comments highlight
- Social proof/testimonials

Section 5: Tools & Resources
[3-4 Recommendations]
- Tool/resource name
- What it does
- Why readers need it
- Quick start tip
- Link (affiliate if applicable)

5. MONETIZATION INTEGRATION

Sponsor Section (if applicable):
- Sponsor introduction
- Native content style
- Clear value for readers
- Seamless integration
- FTC disclosure

Product/Service Promotion:
- Soft sell approach
- Problem/solution format
- Social proof included
- Limited time element
- Clear CTA button

Affiliate Recommendations:
- Genuine endorsements
- Personal experience shared
- Pros and cons mentioned
- Disclosure included
- Tracking links formatted

6. NEWSLETTER DESIGN ELEMENTS

Visual Hierarchy:
- Clear section breaks
- Consistent heading styles
- Readable fonts (14px+ body)
- Mobile-optimized layout
- 600px max width
- Alt text for images

Color Scheme:
- Brand colors consistent
- High contrast text
- CTA buttons stand out
- Link colors obvious
- White space utilized

Images and Graphics:
- Hero image specs
- Section dividers
- Icon usage
- GIF opportunities
- Infographic placement

7. ENGAGEMENT BOOSTERS

Interactive Elements:
- Clickable polls
- Quiz questions
- Rating systems
- Reply prompts
- Social sharing buttons

Personalization Tokens:
- First name usage
- Location references
- Past engagement data
- Preference-based content
- Birthday/anniversary notes

Gamification:
- Streak counters
- Points/badges
- Challenges
- Leaderboards
- Exclusive content unlocks

8. CALL-TO-ACTION STRATEGY

Primary CTA:
- Clear button text
- Contrasting color
- Above the fold
- Repeated if long
- Mobile-friendly size

Secondary CTAs:
- Text links throughout
- Social media follows
- Forward to friend
- Website visits
- Reply encouragement

9. FOOTER SECTION

Standard Elements:
- Unsubscribe link (clear)
- Preferences center
- Contact information
- Social media links
- Company details
- Privacy policy link

Additional Options:
- Referral program
- Archive link
- Feedback request
- App downloads
- Whitelist instructions

10. EMAIL DELIVERABILITY

Technical Optimization:
- Text-to-image ratio (60:40)
- Spam score check
- Link quantity (optimal)
- Authentication setup
- List hygiene reminders

Content Optimization:
- Avoid spam triggers
- Balanced HTML/text
- Proper formatting
- Working links
- Mobile preview

11. PERFORMANCE METRICS

Track These KPIs:
- Open rate (target: 25%+)
- Click rate (target: 7%+)
- Click-to-open rate (target: 20%+)
- Unsubscribe rate (<0.5%)
- Forward rate
- Reply rate
- Conversion rate

A/B Testing Plan:
- Subject lines
- Send times
- Content length
- CTA placement
- Design elements

12. AUTOMATED SEQUENCES

Welcome Series:
- Email 1: Warm welcome
- Email 2: Best content
- Email 3: Community intro
- Email 4: Value delivery
- Email 5: Engagement ask

Re-engagement Campaign:
- Identify inactive subscribers
- Win-back offer
- Content preferences survey
- Last chance email
- Clean list option

13. GROWTH STRATEGIES

Referral Program Copy:
- Incentive explanation
- Sharing instructions
- Reward structure
- Leaderboard mention
- Success stories

Forward Encouragement:
"Know someone who'd love this? Forward this email!"
[Forward button]

Social Proof:
- Subscriber count
- Testimonials
- Results/wins
- Media mentions
- Industry recognition

14. NEWSLETTER VARIATIONS

Daily Version:
[Condensed format - 3 min read]

Weekly Digest:
[Comprehensive - 10 min read]

Monthly Deep Dive:
[Long-form - 15 min read]

Special Edition:
[Event/launch focused]

Provide the complete newsletter copy with all sections, formatting notes, and design suggestions. Write in an engaging, conversational tone that builds relationship with subscribers while delivering massive value. Include specific examples and make the content immediately actionable.
